body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Leonard and Rodah Leonard. Married to Lucinda Gammons Leonard in Mercer County, Kentucky, in June 1854. Father of Benjamin Leonard, John W. Leonard, and Richard W. Leonard. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Washington County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Washington County in 1863. Enrolled in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private on August 18, 1862. Discharged on account of tuberculosis on April 1, 1863.
